Package Battleship.game.GameBoard

Class Board

java.lang.Object
Battleship.game.GameBoard.Board
Direct Known Subclasses:
OpponentBoard
public class Board extends Object
Represents a game board for a single player. This model displays the player's ships
Since:
0.0.0
Version:
0.2.2
Author:
Garrett Kamila Crayton

    • checkAvailable

      public boolean checkAvailable(int row, int col)
      Returns whether the specified Square is available
      Parameters:
      row - the desired row number
      col - the desired column number
      Returns:
      true if the Square is empty (no Ship placed on it), false otherwise

    • move

      public Move move(Coordinate coord)
      Performs the desired move on the specified Square
      Parameters:
      coord - the Coordinate of the desired Square
      Returns:
      the Move object representing the desired move

      Resets the specified Square to the original (null) state.

      See Also:
